The police may or may not be on the way to my house.  A telemarketer called while I was playing.  The following came over my speaker while she was trying to lower my interest rates on a car loan I don't have.  She heard them all.

"Shoot that n*gger in the head!"
"What the f*ck! I shot him twice! How is he still shooting?"
"Suck my shotgun, b*tch!
"Plant the bomb dumb*ss!  Plant the f*cking bomb! Sh*t! He's dead. I'll cover you, grab the bomb, and plant it!"
"Terrorists win"
